Emeka Offor (amụrụ na Febụwarị 10, 1959) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka mmanụ na onye ọchụnta ego, amụrụ na Kafanchan, Kaduna steeti.
O si na obodo Irefi Oraifite na Ekwusigo local government area nke Anambra Steeti, dị na Nigeria
Offor gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Eziukwu Primary School na Aba, Abia Steeti, ya na St
Michael's Primary School na Ogbete, Enugu
Mgbe Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Merchant of Light School, ma mesịa kwaga Abbot Boys High School, Ihiala, Anambra Steeti
O mepụtara Sir Emeka Offor Foundation (SEOF) "iji nyere ndị nọ ná mkpa aka inwe onwe ha ma nwee afọ ojuju".
Ọ bụ Knight nke Saint Christopher na Ụka Anglican nke Naịjirịa, na otu n'ime ndị isi Knights na Oraifite, Anambra Steeti.
